assessments.status_rationale: No confirmed report of the 30-year Treasury closing at or below 4.60%; deadline remains in the future.
October 2025 Housing Starts have not been released; the referenced sources do not include this data.
No evidence of a new BIS rule on AI software/model weights or EDA tools published on federalregister.gov; deadline not yet reached.
AMD’s Q3 2025 segment results have not been released; stock-related headlines do not confirm Data Center revenue growth.
No report of COMEX gold settling at or above $2,550; deadline is still ahead.
No FX level for USD/JPY reaching 148.00 or below is cited; assessment awaits market data before deadline.
No confirmation that ICE Brent front-month settled at or above $90; outcome remains open.
Euro area HCOB Manufacturing PMI (final) for October 2025 has not been published yet.
The BEA PCE report for September 2025 is not out; CPI coverage does not settle the PCE outcome.
The performance window has just begun and runs to 2025-11-30; no comparative return data yet.
